LanguageData.Pa_MG34Z.label: MG 34Z MMG
LanguageData.Pa_MG34Z.description: MG 34 x2 Medium Machinegun attached to a tripod.
LanguageData.Pa_MG42M.label: MG 42 MMG
LanguageData.Pa_MG42M.description: MG 42 Medium Machinegun with telescopic sight attached to a tripod.
LanguageData.Pa_MG45Z.label: MG 14/45z MMG
LanguageData.Pa_MG45Z.description: MG 45 x2 Medium Machinegun with telescopic sight attached to a tripod.
LanguageData.Pa_MG131H.label: MG 131 HMG
LanguageData.Pa_MG131H.description: MG 131 Heavy Machinegun attached to a solid platform.
LanguageData.Pa_MG131Z.label: MG 131z HMG
LanguageData.Pa_MG131Z.description: MG 131 x2 Heavy Machineguns attached to a solid platform.
LanguageData.Turret_MG34Z.label: MG 34z MMG
LanguageData.Turret_MG34Z.description: Maschinengewehr 34 Zwilling(Twin) Medium Machineguns mounted on a Lafette tripod, double the RoF for rapid suppression.
LanguageData.Turret_MG42M.label: MG 42 Lafette MMG
LanguageData.Turret_MG42M.description: Maschinengewehr 42 Medium Machinegun mounted on a Lafette tripod, added a telescopic scope to increase its accuracy and effective range.
LanguageData.Turret_MG45Z.label: MG 14/45z Lafette MMG
LanguageData.Turret_MG45Z.description: Maschinengewehr 14/45 Zwilling(Twin) Medium Machineguns mounted on a Lafette tripod, added a low power scope to increase its accuracy and effective range, consider it a more accurate Minigun turret.
LanguageData.Turret_MG131H.label: MG 131 HMG/Autocannon
LanguageData.Turret_MG131H.description: Maschinengewehr 131 Heavy Machinegun/Autocannon, one of the lighest smallest HMG/Autocannon of its time, designed to either mount of Airplanes or AA defensive platform, capable to chamber explosive rounds to maximize its damage counter any light armored target, very devastating counter soft target.
LanguageData.Turret_MG131Z.label: MG 131z HMG/Autocannon
LanguageData.Turret_MG131Z.description: Maschinengewehr 131 Zwilling(Twin) Heavy Machinegun/Autocannon, due the progress of war demand more firepower for the fighter planes, the usage of autocannon become more and more important, so to increase its RoF and AA efficiency, they double the armament.
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_MG34Z.label: MG 34Z MMG turret
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_MG42M.label: MG 42 Lafette MMG turret
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_MG45Z.label: MG 14/45z Lafette MMG turret
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_MG131H.label: MG 131 HMG/Autocannon turret
LanguageData.MinifiedTurret_MG131Z.label: MG 131z HMG/Autocannon turret
